ModMetaData.name: Praetor Armor
ModMetaData.author: GildedWraith,pphhyy
ModMetaData.description:
Adds a stronger variant of the Prestige Cataphract armor and helmet.
It costs more gold and eltex, while also taking longer to craft, but boosts social impact and has the same Psychic Sensitivity and Neural Heat Recovery Rate bonuses as the non-Power Armor eltex gear occupying the same layers: Eltex Skullcap for the helmet Eltex Robe and Vest for the armor
[h1]Credits:[/h1] - pphhyy: Art
[url=https://discord.gg/7befJWr9xS][img]https://i.imgur.com/cfoFEMA.png[/img][/url]
